list_definition.definition: a drawing or plan, in outline, of (any part of) the surface of the earth, with various features shown (usually roads, rivers, seas, towns etc)
a similar type of drawing showing eg the surface of the moon, the position of the stars in the sky etc.
to make a map of (an area)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Africa was mapped by many different explorers.
